description: This file sets up a knowledge base for a website using a vector database, creates an agent with this knowledge, and queries the agent about how the system works.

classes.name: WebsiteKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from website data.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for managing vector storage in a PostgreSQL database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query.
